dependencies.description:
Python extension that wraps protocol parsing code in hiredis. It
primarily speeds up parsing of multi bulk replies.
dependencies.name: py-hiredis

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
CacheControl is a port of the caching algorithms in httplib2 for use
with requests session object.
dependent_to.name: py-cachecontrol

dependent_to.description: Modin: Make your pandas code run faster by changing one line of code.
dependent_to.name: py-modin

dependent_to.description:
Ray provides a simple, universal API for building distributed
applications.
dependent_to.name: py-ray

dependent_to.description:
RQ (Redis Queue) is a simple Python library for queueing jobs and
processing them in the background with workers.
dependent_to.name: py-rq

dependent_to.description:
A workflow library to easily integrate machine learning libraries with
high performance computing simulations and applications
dependent_to.name: py-smartsim

description: The Python interface to the Redis key-value store.
name: py-redis

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Support for hiredis which speeds up parsing of multi bulk replies
variants.name: hiredis
